reviews.review_msg: Worst prof ever!!! Never take his classes!!
Took this class for my W-requirement. Peter makes lectures fun with jokes/DRAMA. Didn't have my tutorials with him but loved the TA I had. Overall, really enjoyable class.

Lectures are more interesting than English professors. Ended up not going to half of them but studied hard for the final by listening to almost all lecture recordings. Received 96% on final by doing this so either go to class and take good notes or listen later.  Reading the books is not necessary as long as you can provide evidence for ur papers.

Diana was amazing! Extremely helpful with her feedback and her lectures are never boring! She loves the Oxford English Dictionary so always use that in your analysis. 3 words: Analysis, Corgis, Puns. If you like corgis, puns and the dirty dirty jokes of restoration theater, take a class with her!

Really nice lady but the way she marked was insane. Spent a lot of time and effort on my papers and ended up with horrible marks. Also spoke in 90% of tutorials, ended up getting 80100 for participation.. Lecture attendance is highly suggested since that's where she gets the content for her exam. Final was the easiest part of this class.
